mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.FAULTYMACHINE (MACHINENO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, STATUS) values (#{machineno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fstarttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{precoverytime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fendtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select MACHINENO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, STATUS from WISDOM.FAULTYMACHINE
